    Outreach

    OUTREACH

    • Organizational Leadership
    • Academic Service
    • Writing and Translation

    “I am committed to making a positive impact on society by sharing my knowledge and values through social engagement. I believe that exposing myself to diverse perspectives enriches and strengthens my own understanding. Below is a summary of my outreach efforts.”

    Organizational Leadership

    I have been actively involved in leading and organizing various organizations, demonstrating my dedication to fostering vibrant and thriving communities. In 2021, as the 1st Undergraduate President, I helped establish the first SIAM Student Chapter in Korea and contributed to the successful organization of the POSTECH-Peking University joint SIAM student chapter conference.

    Currently serving as the Vice-President of the Korean Association for Consciousness Sciences since 2022, I have taken the initiative to establish and operate the 'Brain-Mind-Behavior' program. In this capacity, I am actively involved in organizing and overseeing programs, including a theory study club and a media club. These leadership roles showcase my dedication to not only operating but also enriching and invigorating these organizations.

    Academic Service

    As a Content Creator, I played a vital role in crafting educational materials for ‘Mathematics for AI’ in 2021 and ‘Philosophy of AI’ in 2022 at the Innovation Center for Education. Additionally, I actively mentored students in Calculus I, Linear Algebra, and its Application throughout Mar 2020 - Jun 2020, Sep 2020 - Dec 2020, and Mar 2021 - Jun 2021.

    Image and Text Layout

    My commitment extended to organizational tasks, where I took a lead in coordinating the POSTECH-Peking University Joint SIAM Student Chapter Conference(Apr 2021) and organizing the POSTECH SIAM Student Chapter Summer School on 'Anomaly Detection: Random Cut Forest'(Jul 2021).

    Writing and Translation

    Image Grid

    I’ve authored magazine articles focusing on Mathematics topics crafted for young students. These pieces cover diverse subjects like ‘Nonlinear Dynamics and a Weak Critique of the Laplace’s Demon’, ‘Mathematical Analysis of COVID-19’, ‘Gödel’s Incompleteness Theorem, and ‘Recipes to Generate Random Numbers’.

    I also wrote an article titled “4 Years of University Exploration Record” where I provided advice to undergraduates about navigating university life, drawing from my own experiences as a recent graduate.

    Furthermore, Additionally, I contributed to the translation of Mark Solms’ book, 'The Hidden Spring,’ into Korean, which was published by Ha-Na Medical Publishment Center in Jun, 2024.
